title: Advocates Sound Alarm on TikTok, Social Media Apps’ Harmful Effects on Young People

title: Ford Launches Europe’s First Hands-Off Driving System on UK Motorways

title: Twitter Allowing Users to Monetize Content Through Subscriptions

title: Coalition Sues California Attorney General Over Alleged Social Media Censorship
description: California Attorney General Rob Bonta announces a lawsuit against Amazon during a news conference in San Francisco on Sept. 14, 2022. (Eric Risberg/AP Photo)
